column1: === {{TranslateThis | anchor = en | en = ACER code }} === {{Property proposal |status = 8692 |description = {{TranslateThis | en = code of energy market player by the Agency for the Cooperation of Energy Regulators }} |subject item = {{Q|392883}} |infobox parameter = |datatype = external-id |domain = {{Q|43229}} |allowed values = |allowed units = |source = https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/european-register , https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/export-public-eu-register |example 1 = {{Q|12723070}} → [https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?tab=1&ac=B00020987.RO B00020987.RO] |example 2 = {{Q|93357797}} → [https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?tab=1&ac=B0000212Z.NL B0000212Z.NL] |example 3 = {{Q|93361389}}, {{Q|6759012}} → [https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?tab=1&ac=A0012202S.UK A0012202S.UK] |example 4 = {{Q|93359203}} → [https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?tab=1&ac=B0000819Q.PT B0000819Q.PT] |example 5 = {{Q|2568787}} → [https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?tab=1&ac=A0000774C.AT A0000774C.AT] |example 6 = {{Q|28920259}} → [https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?ac=A0000532A.CZ&tab=1 A0000532A.CZ] |planned use = Import it |number of ids = 15280 |expected completeness = {{Q|21873974}} |formatter URL = https://www.acer-remit.eu/portal/mp-details?tab=1&ac=$1 |external links = |see also = {{P|8645}} |filter = [A-Z][A-Z0-9]{8}\.[A-Z]{2} |robot and gadget jobs = |subpage = ACER code |topic = authority control }} ====Motivation==== {{ping project|Companies}} {{ping project|Economics}} An important code for the liberated EU energy market. * Also includes these codes: EIC ({{P|8645}}), BIC (bank code {{P|2627}}), LEI ({{P|1278}}), GS1 ({{P|3193}}). * Out of 15.3k entries, 15k are from EU/EEA. But there are a total of 70 countries represented: the largest non-EU countries are the US (90), Singapore, Macedonia, Serbia.
